name: Don't Freeze (Stigurna, bessu, TonttuLordi)
description:
Play as a tiny flame who needs find their ever-moving home and stay warm in a world engulfed in darkness and cold.

This is our entry to the GrapeFruit GameJam #3.
This is also TonttuLordi's and bessu's first game jam! 

We had some troubles but we got this to show for it. All criticism, good and bad is welcome.

Programming: Stigurna (Aleksi Mangström) & TonttuLordi
Pixel Art: bessu (Atte Härkönen)
